You can also use this peer easily by copying the following command then pste on your vps

```
PEERS="239caa37cb0f131b01be8151631b649dc700cd97@95.217.200.36:46656,0465032114df76df206c9983968f2d229b3a50d6@88.198.32.17:39656,2c40b0aedc41b7c1b20c7c243dd5edd698428c41@138.201.85.176:26696,ac5089a8789736e2bc3eee0bf79ca04e22202bef@162.55.80.116:29656,8671c2dbbfd918374292e2c760704414d853f5b7@35.215.121.109:26656,7416a65de3cc548a537dbb8bdf93dbd83fe401d2@78.107.234.44:26656,62fa77951a7c8f323c0499fff716cd86932d8996@65.108.199.36:24214,5af3d50dcc231884f3d3da3e3caecb0deef1dc5b@142.132.134.112:25356,1145755896d6a3e9df2f130cc2cbd223cdb206f0@209.145.53.163:29656,408ee86160af26ee7204d220498e80638f7874f4@161.97.109.47:38656"sed -i -e "s|^persistent_peers *=.*|persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"|" $HOME/.ojo/config/config.toml

```
